text: Ivan Kizimov (; 28 May 1928 – 22 September 2019)Ушел из жизни выдающийся спортсмен и тренер Иван Михайлович Кизимов) was a Soviet-born Russian equestrian and Olympic champion. He was born in Novocherkassk. He won a gold medal in dressage at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City,"1968 Summer Olympics - Mexico City, Mexico - Equestrian" databaseOlympics.com (Retrieved on 21 September 2008) and a gold medal in team dressage at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich."1972 Summer Olympics - München, Germany - Equestrian" databaseOlympics.com (Retrieved on 21 September 2008) ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Ivan Kizimov
